attributes.action: recommend to H.M the queen that j.k rowing should be awarded a damehood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: J.K Rowling O.B.E is an inspiration to young people all over the world not only did she write the hugely successful Harry Potter series which has sold nearly 400 million copies and encouraged children all over the world to start reading again but she has also donated millions of pounds to charity and become the worlds most successfull auther i think that she deserves to upgrade her O.B.E to a Damehood for all her hard work.

rejection.details: Please refer to http://www.honours.gov.uk for details relating to the Honours system
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
